Scheduling or Time Tracking

Try Ximble 14 days free

Integrated Time-Tracking

Clock-In /Clock-Out from the Web or Smart Phone

Employees can now clock-in and out by web, text message or mobile app. With our sophisticated time-clocking features, the power to track staff attendance and punctuality in real-time has never been easier and more accurate.

Flexibility and Control

By entering employees’ hourly pay, employers can clearly see exactly what your total scheduled employee cost is for the week.

Is overtime a nagging cost? No problem – set overtime to any amount of hours per day or week and our system will alert you before scheduling someone for overtime, allowing you to make a different choice and saving valuable resources as as result.

Power of Mobile

One-handed Scheduling

Create new shifts and handle last-minute schedule changes on-the-go

XimbleChat™

Keep in touch with your Team in real time, on all devices. Upload and share files and images instantaneously. Leverage “channels” to group and direct messages to appropriate participants.

Shift Reminders

Never hear, “Gee, boss, I didn’t realize I was supposed to work today,” ever again!

Reduce Absenteeism

With our free mobile app for iPhone and Android, your employees are always carrying their up-to-date schedule

Manage Requests

Give employees a speedy ‘yes’ or ‘no’ on their time off, shift trade, replacement and/or drop requests

Business Insights

Understand how your workforce is performing by accessing our complete, feature-rich reporting system from your mobile phone

Open Shift Alerts

Fill that last-minute vacancy: employees are automatically alerted to open shifts needing to be filled

Push notifications

The latest in mobile technology empowers your workforce and keeps them in the loop
